page.title: 14Recreation
page.content: There are two play areas in Barrow Hill itself providing some activities for the very young.People have to travel to Staveley or Chesterfield for more organised pursuits.Middlecroft leisure centre in Staveley has a swimming pool and a large sports hall. Chesterfield has an additional small pool for toddlers.Sheffield has an ice rink.Staveley Works has sporting facilities for its workers on a sports ground at Barrow Hill.There is a running track and nets for cricket and a football pitch.Barrow Hill and Staveley have thriving working mens' clubs providing a variety of adult entertainment.There are footpaths and bridle tracks running through the area providing pleasant walks through open fields and woodland.
